__TOC__

If you've got suggestions about promotional goodies for ubuntu-be you can add them here.
Make sure to add the following things:
*** A picture
*** Price (including all costs, VAT, shipping to belgium, import taxes (if ordered outside the EU), set-up cost for the logo print, ...)
*** Minimal order quantity
*** Discount if we order more?
*** Where you found the offer (website / company name / ...)
*** How many colours can be printed
*** ...
=== Pens ===
===== Possibility 1 (added by warddr 18/02/2011): =====
*** picture: http://beheer.bgo.nl//img/products/179/big/3441.jpg
*** price: €230,86 for 600 = €0,385 / piece (maybe a litle more expensive for shipment to Belgium, this is only including shipment to The Netherlands)
*** minimum order quantity: 600
*** It gets cheaper if we buy more, we can buy 1200 for €340,94 = €0,285 / piece
*** http://www.pen-online.nl/offerte.html?ProductID=179
*** This is the price for a 1 color print

*** I think for ubuntu an orange pen is suited best, but there are other colours if someone disagrees.

=== USB Live Ubuntu ===
(added by steven@leeman.be)
*** Canonical shop offers a 4gbyte stick for >20euro's... 
*** We can get it made cheaper <10euro...
*** Minimum size necessary is 1gbyte 
*** a normal stick or a credit card size
*** examples
